data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Sendai.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Tokyo at Yurtec Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Tokyo a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Throw-in Tokyo.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Yojiro Takahagi for Tokyo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 9, Goal kick for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tokyo's Takuya Uchida breaks free at Yurtec Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 10, Sendai have a goal kick.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Kensuke Nagai (Tokyo) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 11, Nobutsugu Murakami awards Sendai a goal kick.
Tokyo to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
In the minute 15, Leandro scores to make it 0-1 at Yurtec Stadium.
Kensuke Nagai with an assist there.
In Sendai, Tokyo push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 20, Sendai are coming forward and Shun Nagasawa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Tokyo at Yurtec Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Sendai throw-in in Tokyo's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Sendai will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tokyo.
Para for Sendai has been booked by Nobutsugu Murakami and receives a first yellow card.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 32, Tokyo's Leandro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Sendai a goal kick.
Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Sendai in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
At Yurtec Stadium, Takumi Sasaki has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Sendai.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Sendai.
Free kick Sendai.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
In the minute 44, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Takuya Uchida of Tokyo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Tokyo close to the penalty box.
The first-half is over at Yurtec Stadium.
The second-half is underway at Yurtec Stadium.
Sendai needs to be cautious. Tokyo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 46, Shingo Hyodo is on a sub for Takumi Sasaki for Sendai.
The away team replace Takumi Nakamura with Ryoya Ogawa.
In the minute 47, Goal! Shun Nagasawa (Sendai) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Sendai.
Shingo Hyodo instrumental with a fine assist.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
In the minute 50, Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ryoya Ogawa (Tokyo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 51, In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yasuhiro Hiraoka (Sendai) has received a yellow card from Nobutsugu Murakami.
Throw-in for Tokyo at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 52, Throw-in Tokyo.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a throw-in for Sendai, close to Tokyo's area.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
In the minute 54, Sendai's Keiya Shiihashi misses with an attempt on goal.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
In the minute 57, Free kick Tokyo.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Tokyo's Yojiro Takahagi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sendai defender.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
Free kick for Sendai in the half of Tokyo.
Takashi Kiyama (Sendai) is making a second substitution, with Koji Hachisuka replacing Para.
In the minute 60, Sendai push forward at Yurtec Stadium and Shun Nagasawa gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Tokyo defence.
Tokyo advance rapidly upfield but Nobutsugu Murakami blows for offside.
Sendai are caught offside.
In the minute 62, Tokyo's Keigo Higashi has been booked in Sendai.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tokyo close to the penalty box.
Goal! Yojiro Takahagi gives Tokyo a 1-2 lead.
In the minute 65, Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Sendai throw-in in Tokyo's half.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Sendai's Jakub Slowik is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sendai drive upfield and Shun Nagasawa gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tokyo defender.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Yoshiki Matsushita is replacing Takuma Hamasaki for the home team.
Sendai make their fourth substitution with Shuhei Akasaki replacing Shun Nagasawa.
In the minute 71, Adailton is replacing Kensuke Nagai for the away team.
The away team replace Keigo Higashi with Hirotaka Mita.
Shuto Abe (Tokyo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 73, Throw-in high up the field for Sendai in Sendai.
Isaac Cuenca of Sendai gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Sendai make their fifth substitution with Takayoshi Ishihara replacing Keiya Shiihashi.
The away team have replaced Leandro with Kyosuke Tagawa. This is the fourth substitution made today by Kenta Hasegawa.
In the minute 81, Sendai have a goal kick.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 83, Isaac Cuenca (Sendai) has received a first yellow card.
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Sendai go level at 2-2 through Yoshiki Matsushita in Sendai.
In the minute 85, Can Tokyo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sendai's half?
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Taichi Hara is replacing Takuya Uchida for Tokyo at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 87, In Sendai Sendai drive forward through Isaac Cuenca. His shot is on target but it's saved.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sendai.
Can Sendai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
The 2nd half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
Nobutsugu Murakami signals a Sendai throw-in in Tokyo's half.
Throw-in for Sendai in the half of Tokyo.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Nobutsugu Murakami.
Nobutsugu Murakami awards Sendai a goal kick.
Adailton (Tokyo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
At Yurtec Stadium, Sendai are penalized for being offside.
Nobutsugu Murakami blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
